extendedInfo.description: Clean easy to use hour and time calculator.Add, Subtract and Calculate Elapsed Times.Use Menu to:Select Display Format:Decimal, #h #m #s or hh:mm:ssSelect hour format:12/24Select precision:#.#, #.##, #.###hh:mm, hh:mm:ssToggle Vibrate: On/OffPlease email any questions or requests... Thanks.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Has been a great help calculating elapsed time, i.e. 8:00am To 3:00pm = 7 hrs. However, I can\'t figure out how to calculate time plus number of hours  - i.e. 8:00 am plus 7 hours. (The answer would be 3:00 pm.)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did exactly what I needed it to.
reviews.comment: I needed a calculator for helping me add up my time sheet totals every few weeks and this app was easy and effective. I also like the exact decimal time amounts out gives you.
reviews.author: Anna Tatistcheff

reviews.title: Thanks!
reviews.comment: Great app! Thanks for making and sharing. Im a flyer and needed a quick way to add up flight times and this does it nicely. No fault of the program, but my organization breaks down the tenths of an hour slightly differently, so I just use the min and convert myself. Only change I would make is add option for military time format so the : doesnt have to be added between hours & min. Overall excellent program - made my life much easier! Thanks again!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: I would like to see about 25% or more reduction in key size so that there is an area to display atleast a three move history.  Great start!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: @Lucas: if you haven\'t changed the precision, 9h45m = 9.75h ~ 9.8h is the correct answer... what did you think the answer should be?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thought it was faulty at first like the others, but once I figured out how to input it in a certain sequence, this app is golden. 10stars if I could!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great job
reviews.comment: Whoever put this one together made my life a hell of a lot easier. I just wish it wouldn\'t always ask to clear data when I go to put in my next set of times.
reviews.author: Zach Arvizu

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for. Would love to see an undo function... maybe a way to see all the times in the equation ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app! I keep track of my own hours and this app makes figuring and totaling my hours a snap!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t calc fi 11:30pm + 2hr30mi! Better calc with spreadsheet!No one made the right calc.Don\'t mention about diff time zone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works  but...
reviews.comment: Time calculator works. The original way of showing the time is not hh:mm:ss but hh.m you can fix that by pressing the menu button and it will stay that way until you change it again. It also has some other minor flaws. I\'d say go ahead and try it. It\'s free after all.
reviews.author: Patrick Leeming

reviews.title: Scott
reviews.comment: Great app,just what I needed.Works with no problems.
reviews.author: steven scott

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Gives the answer in decimal parts of an hour, which is exactly what I require.  Answer readout could be larger and a switch to turn off the delete confirmation.  Love the no permissions needed.
reviews.author: Warren McRobie

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: No matter how I entered, apparently would not tally the time. Waste of time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: This app is worse than seeing a 300 pound old lady naked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!!
reviews.comment: This app is exactly what I was looking for -- a way to calculate the amount of time between time A and time B. I didn\'t want to have to enter date information. This app does exactly what I need it to do and it makes it easy for me. Love it!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Entered 08:15am to 09:00am as a test and it said the answer was 0.75. On what planet? I thought this was supposed to calculate time....uninstall.
reviews.author: Bex Hand

reviews.title: Simple & Efficient!
reviews.comment: This app works great. I haven\'t tried any other apps but I don\'t need to this is exactly what I needed to calculate the employee hours for the small business I work at. Way better & less time consuming then the old fashioned way (;
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good for elapsed time sucks for hour calculations
reviews.comment: If you want to know how many hours are between 8am and 4pm this app will tell you. If you want to know what time plus time is you must use the + button for the final calculation. Subtracting does not work. 4 hours - 4 hours = -8 hours? Has potential but not there yet.
reviews.author: Kris Pate

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: My employer uses decimal  format time for our timekeeping (payroll). This app makes keeping track of my hours a piece of cake! Thanks!
reviews.author: Robin Zinn
